verses.roman:
tathāpi ei sūtrera śuna dig-daraśana
sakāraṇa likhi ādau guru-āśrayaṇa

synonyms: tathāpi—still; ei sūtrera—of the synopsis of this book; śuna—hear; dik-daraśana—an indication; sakāraṇa—the cause; likhi—we should write; ādau—in the beginning; guru-āśrayaṇa—accepting a bona fide spiritual master.
translation: "Because you asked me for a synopsis, please hear these few indications. In the beginning one must take shelter of a bona fide spiritual master.
